review: SIMPLY AWSOME!  This device has limited apps, but I discovered that if you type "file:///c:/" (without the quotes) in your google chrome browser location bar that you can access and play and stream local video through google chrome to your TV, this includes accessing video through any drive such as your DVD drive...just change c to your drive letter in the command above.  It's like finding a file on you local machine using FTP file browsing methods.  Don't worry you can't delete a file accidentally...it won't let you.  Look for user and applications...users...video...etc.  Once you locate where your local video or picture files are located you are basically calling the file up using your browser and running the file...pretty easy. Hint...set a bookmark in your browser to find files easily later once you locate them initially. Theoretically this should work with any file type your google chrome browser can open...such as .pdf .mkv .avi .jpg .mp4 ...etc.  you must have google chrome chromecast installed properly using the instructions as they come with the chromecast dongle.  No extra programs needed.... just chrome browser and chromecast and an internet connection. Works perfectly.

review: WHEN USING CHROMECAST WITH THE IPAD NETFLIX APP, NETFLIX AND CHROMECAST LOSE THEIR CONNECTION. THIS HAPPENS EVEN IF AUTO-LOCK IS DISABLED AND THE IPAD REMAINS AWAKE THROUGHOUT THE MOVIE. RE-ESTABLISHING THE LINK REQUIRES POWERING OFF THE TV (AND CHROMECAST), KILLING THE NETFLIX PROCESS, AND DISABLING/ENABLING WIFI.THAT IS VERY POOR DESIGN OR IMPLEMENTATION ON THE PART OF GOOGLE AND NETFLIX. ONE OR BOTH OF THEM HAS FAILED TO MARKET A RELIABLE PRODUCT THAT CAN OPERATE IN A REAL WORLD ENVIRONMENT.i would rate it 5 stars for performance, but the reliebility issue knocks off 2 stars.
